projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Skill-Craft AI: Rehearse, Refine, Achieve—With AI
projects.bodyText:
- A web app built using Flask for interview preparation based on job roles.
 - Integrated AI-generated questions and a real-time Python code visualizer.
 - Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQLite for cross-platform support.

projects.title: Jurify – Lawyer Personalized Appointment Management System
projects.bodyText:
- A lawyer appointment and case management system built using React.js, Node.js, and Express.js.
 - Integrated a chatbot for legal assistance and streamlined appointment booking.
 - Developed with Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, and connected via REST APIs for full-stack functionality.

projects.title: Basic Calculator
projects.bodyText:
- Built a responsive calculator interface using HTML and CSS, optimized for both desktop and mobile screens.
 -  Implemented core arithmetic operations ( +, −, ×, ÷ ) using JavaScript logic.
 - Added dark mode toggle, interactive button animations, and keyboard input support for better usability.
 - Displays calculation history with an option to clear history for user convenience.

projects.title: To-Do-List
projects.bodyText:
- Built a responsive and theme-switchable To-Do List using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring smooth animations and clean UI.
 - Implemented localStorage to persist tasks across sessions without any backend.
 - Designed a fully front-end application with multiple themes (Standard, Light, Darker) and mobile-friendly layout.
